title: Updates to the Main Menu Download Area

body.body: Updates to the Main Menu Download Area
The individual ECM based download area provided on the diagnostic tool Main Menu has been updated for all models supported by the Smart Scan feature.
The Smart Scan feature currently supports:
- All two cylinder and three cylinder models fitted with a KTKS or KTKS-UDS Engine ECM (Euro V compliant Engine ECM with three connectors, introduced from 2019 onwards).

Models not supported by the Smart Scan feature will continue to use the existing Automatic/Manual Model Selection download features. This includes models built before introduction of those outlined above.
For supported models, all ECMs listed in the Download menu will now use the Smart Scan based pre download scan and model confirmation workflow.
From the Triumph Diagnostic Tool Main Menu, navigate to
, then select the required ECM type.
Follow the motorcycle connection instructions and click
Upon clicking Start, the diagnostic tool will scan the motorcycle to detect the model and market variant.

search: Updates to the Main Menu Download Area
The individual ECM based download area provided on the diagnostic tool Main Menu has been updated for all models supported by the Smart Scan feature.
The Smart Scan feature currently supports:
- All two cylinder and three cylinder models fitted with a KTKS or KTKS-UDS Engine ECM (Euro V compliant Engine ECM with three connectors, introduced from 2019 onwards).
- Single cylinder 400cc models.
- Motocross Off Road motorcycles.

Models not supported by the Smart Scan feature will continue to use the existing Automatic/Manual Model Selection download features. This includes models built before introduction of those outlined above.
For supported models, all ECMs listed in the Download menu will now use the Smart Scan based pre download scan and model confirmation workflow.
From the Triumph Diagnostic Tool Main Menu, navigate to
Download
, then select the required ECM type.
Follow the motorcycle connection instructions and click
Start
to begin.
Upon clicking Start, the diagnostic tool will scan the motorcycle to detect the model and market variant.
The Model Confirmation process is the same as the Smart Scan feature. See
Smart Scan - Motorcycle Model and Market Variant Confirmation
After confirming the Model and Market Variant, the ECM Status Summary screen will display the calibration details. A summary is also displayed indicating if and update is required or not.
If the ECM is up to date, the ECM Status Summary panel will be green and the message
Update Not Required
will be displayed.
If an update is available, the ECM Status Summary panel will be red and the message
Update Required
will be displayed.
Double check that the model name and market variant details are correct, then:
Click
Start
to start the download, or;
Click
Cancel
to return to Download menu if the details are incorrect, or the if ECM is already up to date.
Recovery Download Switch
A Recovery Download switch has been added to the download summary screen.
This is provided as a means to recover download failures which are not recoverable using the normal Smart Scan based download process.

When the switch is moved to the On position, the tool will disable download time reduction measures and will download all calibration components regardless of their status. The maximum download time will be incurred when using this feature.
To use the feature, simply switch the Recovery Download switch to the
On
position before clicking the
Start
button to begin the download.
